item.description: Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0342; 07:03AM; NB 110 Fwy south of Redondo Beach Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wk8TtR; #HarborGateway; PRELIM: Solo vehicle off freeway embankment. One person (unknown age / gender) found trapped and determined deceased in vehicle. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: CHP South LA (Log #698) and Coroner.; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E264 E79 RA79 T64; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#0313; 06:43AM; 1324 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hosxey; #BoyleHeights; 22 LAFD responders took just 30 minutes in a largely defensive firefight to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a vacant 45' x 50' one-story former fast-food restaurant, the site of a previous fire. No injuries. No other structures damaged. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 RA17 T2; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0313; 06:13AM; 1324 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hosxey; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations against heavy fire showing from a vacant 45' x 50' one-story commercial building (former fast-food restaurant), the site of a previous fire.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 RA17 T2; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0262; 05:06AM; 11400 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3ZRaEMK; #BroadwayManchester; PRELIM: Two vehicle traffic collision with entrapment, with one car into building. Two patients total (unknown age / gender / affiliation): 1 taken to the hospital by LAFD Paramedics in Critical condition, the other was determined deceased and remains at scene. L.A. Dept of Building & Safety enroute to assess structure. No other injuries reported. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD South Traffic Division (Incident #688) and Coroner.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E64 EM13 HR3 RA33 RA64 T33 T64; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Fire; INC#0240; 04:36AM; 1652 S Grande Vista Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3iZc5rW; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: LAFD Firefighters arrived quickly to extinguish a homeless encampment fire, where they discovered one person (undetermined age / gender) deceased. No other persons injured. No further details. Fire and specific cause of death under active investigation. Media Inquiries: LAPD Hollenbeck (Incident #675) and Coroner.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 E25 PH1; CH7; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#1734; 11:55PM; 6140 W Hollywood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GYfrDw; #Hollywood; 28 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes to access, confine and extinguish flames involving rubbish that led to the involvement and explosion of one-or-more propane tanks on LAFD arrival. The fire was prevented from causing significant damage to a 50' x 100' one story commercial building. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E27 E52 E82 RA27 T27 T35; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1734; 11:30PM; 6140 W Hollywood Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GYfrDw; #Hollywood; PRELIM: Outside fire involving rubbish led to the involvement and explosion of one-or-more propane tanks (without injury) on LAFD arrival, with active flames now threatening a 50' x 100' one story commercial building.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E27 E52 E82 RA27 T27 T35; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0276; 05:40AM; EB 10 Fwy East of Creshaw Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/2OMPorQ; #MidCity; Multi-Vehicle collision with 2 vehicles overturned. 3 Patients total: 2 in critical condition, 1 fatality at scene. #LATraffic: Closure of one or more lanes until CHP / Caltrans operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries; CHP Central LA Log #488 and Coroner.; FS 68; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC18 E294 E34 E68 EM11 RA34 RA68 RA94 T94; CH4; 13; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#0675; 02:15PM; 235 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HkYpAT; #HistoricSouthCentral; Due to the structure's significant instability and collapse, which thankfully caused no injury, dozens of LAFD firefighters will remain at the scene through this evening to comb through tons of smoldering debris, salvage personal belongings and fully extinguish compartmentalized flames. Displaced by the blaze and now being assisted by the American Red Cross are five members of one family (4 adults and 1 child). The fire's cause has been determined to be electrical in nature.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E10 E14 E20 E210 E215 E226 EA1 EM11 RA46 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T15 T26 T9; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#0675; 01:10PM; 235 E 29th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HkYpAT; #HistoricSouthCentral; 65 LAFD Firefighters took just 1 hour, 55 minutes in largely defensive operations to access, confine and extinguish heavy fire found in the attic of a 1,454 square foot one-story home (built 1910), that led to extensive structural collapse, beginning within 10 minutes of LAFD arrival. No injuries reported to (undetermined number) occupants, or firefighters. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 E10 E14 E20 E210 E215 E226 EA1 EM11 RA46 RA810 RA9 SQ21 T10 T15 T26 T9; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
